# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. Given its high quality and unique features, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it directly from me at the same price point. This ensures you receive the best possible service and support tailored to your needs. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
